item.title: OpenAI’s supposedly ‘leaked’ Super Bowl ad with ear buds and a shiny orb was a hoax
item.description: As if OpenAI didn't have enough drama around the Super Bowl and advertising, as the game wound down, word spread of a "leaked" ad that actually wasn't leaked at all; it was just a fake. Screenshots of a now-deleted Reddit thread told the tale of a frustrated employee who, while posting about how upset they […]

item.title: Turning Point USA’s Halftime Show Was Exactly What You’d Expect
item.description: “The All-American Halftime Show," born out of outrage over Bad Bunny's Super Bowl performance, fell short of the hype. From Kid Rock’s poor lip synching to Erika Kirk being MIA, it was simply dull.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 replay — how to watch Patriots vs Seahawks full game and highlights for free

item.title: Olympics 2026: How to watch, schedule of events, and everything else you need to know about the Winter Games
item.description:
The Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics are coming up. (Mattia Ozbot/Getty Images)
Mattia Ozbot via Getty Images
The 2026 Winter Olympics are taking place in Italy this year, with all the action taking place in Milan and the Alpine city of Cortina. This year marks the fourth time Italy has hosted the Winter Games; most recently, Turin hosted in 2006. Of the 16 sports that will be featured at the Winter Olympics, there will be 15 returning favorites, including figure skating, Alpine skiing, curling, ice hockey, speedskating, snowboarding, freestyle skiing and ski jumping, and one e...

item.title: Trump breaks silence on Bad Bunnys Super Bowl Halftime Show
item.description: Shocker: Donald Trump didn't like Bad Bunny's Super Bowl Halftime Show.
